**2023-03-15 / @aclements, @adonovan, @andybons, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- **all: add GOOS=wasip1 GOARCH=wasm port** [#58141](https://go.dev/issue/58141)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/x509: support SCT/OCSP passthrough when using platform verifiers** [#58251](https://go.dev/issue/58251)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **log/slog: structured, leveled logging** [#56345](https://go.dev/issue/56345)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **use a zero for third digit for major release, such as 'go1.23.0'** [#57631](https://go.dev/issue/57631)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/tools/go/analysis: add Analyzer.URL and Diagnostic.URL fields** [#57906](https://go.dev/issue/57906)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/cgo: get rid of CFType, JNI, EGL unsafe.Pointer => uintptr special cases** [#41337](https://go.dev/issue/41337)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **crypto/x509: support code-constrained roots** [#57178](https://go.dev/issue/57178)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/net/http2: add IdleConnTimeout to http2.Transport** [#57893](https://go.dev/issue/57893)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **flag: Add IgnoreOnError ErrorHandling** [#58839](https://go.dev/issue/58839)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **slices: add difference function** [#58730](https://go.dev/issue/58730)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
